question: What is the symbolic meaning of the different postures during Prayer?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
I have heard a few theories in this subject, one of being that the postures
Represent the servitude of the different creations of Allah. Thus Qiyaam
Represents the trees, Rukoo, the four legged animals, Sajdah, those animals
who crawl and Jalsah, the mountains. However, I have been unable to document
this from authentic sources due to lack of reference

Material. Primarily, salaat is as it is because it has been taught to us in
This way. Nabi (saw) stated "Perform salaah as you see me do so''
(mishkaat). Trying to grasp the symbolic meaning of salaah, although
understandable , can have no impact on ones imaan, therefore not
deserving of great concern.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Bilaal Cassim
FATWA DEPT.
